name: esquire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK (also Esquire) (abbreviation Esq.) a title added after a man's name on envelopes and official documents
US (also Esquire) (abbreviation Esq.) a title added after the full name of a man or woman who is a lawyer
[ C ] in the past, a nobleman who worked for and helped a knight or king
